body_html:
Re automatic inference of type attributes this is something we do at the other language bindings now, so I think you should add it to the scala bindings.
…
On Wed, Aug 23, 2017 at 6:20 AM, Anthony Platanios ***@***.*** > wrote: @alextp <https://github.com/alextp> Sounds good! I'll do that. :) Do you plan to add automatic inference for the type attributes or should I assume I need to set them? @andydavis1 <https://github.com/andydavis1> Yes, this issue can be closed. :) — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub <#12375 (comment)>, or mute the thread <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AAATxdrVSlvi1v_9WdgapS1QFGWxieGWks5sbCc7gaJpZM4O68WV> .
-- - Alex

Re automatic inference of type attributes this is something we do at the
other language bindings now, so I think you should add it to the scala
bindings.

body:
Re automatic inference of type attributes this is something we do at the
other language bindings now, so I think you should add it to the scala
bindings.

On Wed, Aug 23, 2017 at 6:20 AM, Anthony Platanios <notifications@github.com
> wrote:

> @alextp <https://github.com/alextp> Sounds good! I'll do that. :) Do you
> plan to add automatic inference for the type attributes or should I assume
> I need to set them?

> closed. :)
